sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
[A pick-tooth for the Pope, or,] The pack-mans pater noster Sempill, James, Sir, 1566-1625. Sempill, Robert, 1595?-1665?
30+ [i.e. 12] p.
s.n., [Edinburgh : 1700]
Satire in verse on the Catholic liturgy; with additions by the author's son Robert Sempill. Imperfect: Dark, with much loss of text. Lacks all before p. 17, 21-22, 25-26 and all after p. 30. Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
=======
